a1Dendro: After nearby party members trigger <pyro>Burning</pyro> reactions or deal <pyro>Pyro DMG</pyro> or <dendro>Dendro DMG</dendro> to an opponent affected by <pyro>Burning</pyro>
a1Electro: After nearby party members trigger <overloaded>Overloaded</overloaded> reactions
a1Anemo: After nearby party members trigger <pyro>Pyro Swirl</pyro> reactions
a1Geo: After nearby party members trigger <pyro>Pyro Crystallize</pyro> reactions
a4Cond: Consuming a stack of Primordial Fusion
c1Cond: Consuming a stack of Cycle of Enlightenment
dark_burst_defIgn_: Denial of Darkness Ele. Burst Def. Ign.
